original_text: So Bathsheba went to the king in his chamber (now the king was very old, and Abishag the Shunammite was attending to the king).
korean_text: 밧세바가 이에 침실에 들어가 왕에게 이르니 왕이 심히 늙었으므로 수넴 여자 아비삭이 시중들었더라

sentences.original_text: So Bathsheba went to the king in his chamber
now the king was very old
and Abishag the Shunammite was attending to the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 수넴 여자 아비삭이 왕을 섬기고 있었습니다
